attributes.action: Introduce laws to make it illegal to use taxpayer pounds to fund 'special adviser' political appointees at all levels of government.
attributes.additional_details: Particularly in the Prime Minister's Office where there is no apparent limit to the number nor cost of these people because he has no budgetary limitations upon his profligacy with taxpayer pounds.  Taxpayers MUST not be required to pay for the unoversighted and hubristic manner in which our political players operate.
